{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=VVG2000 |revision=-1 (B/D) |asin= |est_release_date=06/2011 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6368 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640DBTC-90G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV8M16FS-6K |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43222L;BCM4322LKBFG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=VE880 Series VoicePort IC;Legerity (Microsemi);Le88221DLC;;1; |flags=VDSL2, ADSL2+, VoIP, |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|VDSL2 Voice Gateway with 802.11n Wireless AP}} ===Specifications=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/vvg2000-1 ''Netgear VVG2000-1'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/netgear-vvg2000-vdsl2-voice-gateway-with-80211n-791 ''Netgear VVG2000'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] :VDSL2 modem, 802.11bgn Wireless AP :(D): 2.4GHz CAT-IQ DECT Radio (2ch) :4x FE (10/100) Ethernet ports, :1x FXS port for VoIP, 1x FXO port :2x USB 2.0 ports *[http://www.adp.ru/netgear/vvg2000.html VVG2000 Product Model Summary] 
Model		Annex	Radio	FXS	FXO	DECT
VVG2000		A	Yes	Yes	No	No
VVG2000D	A	Yes	Yes	Yes	Yes
VVG2000B	B	Yes	Yes	No	No
VVG2000BD	B	Yes	Yes	Yes	Yes
